title: jungle Ezreal is pretty fun guys
body:
You should all give it a try. You have to learn how to kite and not get hit by jungle camps to survive it tho.

**Build**
My build would probably be as the core:
{{item:3719}} OR {{item:3723}}  -> {{item:1001}} -> {{item:3078}} -> {{item:3158}} -> {{item:3035}} 
You could also swap you {{item:3722}} OR {{item:3726}} If you want more late game power and magic damage over AD and Atk Spd.

After that I would build anything from this list:
{{item:3153}} {{item:3508}} {{item:3135}} {{item:3157}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3091}} {{item:3102}} {{item:3072}} 

**Summoners**
Take {{summoner:11}} then one of the following with it:
{{summoner:3}} {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:14}} 

**Runes & Masteries**
Click on "Jungle Ezreal" for both links (Should be the Active one)
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/32534570#masteries
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/32534570#runes

You can check my games as Jungle Ezreal: http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/47427432
--------------------------------
I'll answer any questions you have. c:
